input.label: Topic
input.name: topic
input.placeholder: Enter a topic to get the pros and cons of it

input.label: Context/Additional Instruction
input.name: context/additionalInstruction
input.sample: write the pros and cons of consuming/using modern medicine
input.placeholder: You can give additional instruction/context for a more accurate output (optional)

data.output:
Pros:

- Modern medicine saves lives

- Modern medicine cures diseases

- Modern medicine prolongs life

Cons:

- Modern medicine costs too much

- Modern medicine causes side effects

- Modern medicine is addictive

input.label: Topic
input.name: topic
input.placeholder: Enter a topic to get the pros and cons of it

input.label: Context/Additional Instruction
input.name: context/additionalInstruction
input.sample: the benefits and drawbacks of leading a minimalistic life
input.placeholder: You can give additional instruction/context for a more accurate output (optional)

data.output:
Pros:

- Minimalism saves money

- You don't have to buy anything you don't need

- It's easier to travel light

Cons:

- Minimalist life isn't for everyone

- Traveling with less stuff can be stressful

- Minimalism doesn't always save money

input.label: Topic
input.name: topic
input.placeholder: Enter a topic to get the pros and cons of it

input.label: Context/Additional Instruction
input.name: context/additionalInstruction
input.sample: give me the advantages and disadvantages of cold outreaching via emails
input.placeholder: You can give additional instruction/context for a more accurate output (optional)

data.output:
Pros:

- You can get in touch with many people at once

- You don't have to write an entire letter or cover sheet for each person

- It's easy to do

Cons:

- People might not respond

- They might think you're spamming them

- Your message may be too long

input.sample: los beneficios e inconvenientes de llevar una vida minimalista
input.placeholder: You can give additional instruction/context for a more accurate output (optional)

data.output:
Ventajas:

- Puedes ahorrar dinero viviendo en una casa más pequeña, comiendo menos y sin tantas cosas.

- Es muy fácil viajar con un mínimo de cosas.

Contras:

- Tu ropa puede desgastarse más rápido

- Puede ser más difícil encontrar buenos trabajos si no tienes muchas posesiones materiales.
